data.title: Accreditation and Memberships
data.meta_description: GSD has been authorized by the Canton of Geneva as a private university for Diplomacy and International Relations.
data.text:
FSEP

FSEP Swiss Federation of Private Schools (CH) aims to promote the high level and value of Swiss educational institutions throughout the world. Members have a national or international quality recognition or accreditation.

EDUQUA

GSD has obtained EDUQUA Swiss certification. EduQua is an accreditation body recognized and supported by the Swiss Confederate Government; it’s the first quality certification for public and private educational institutions in Switzerland. This Swiss certificate guarantees and develops the quality for institutions.

AGEP

AGEP Geneva Association of Private Schools (CH) established in 1959, is a professional organization. It’s well-known influence and moral authority make of this association a key member of Geneva’s educational community.

SGS

GSD has obtained EDUQUA Swiss certification. This Swiss certificate guarantees and develops the quality for institutions. EDUQUA, and therefore GSD is certified by SGS Société Générale de Surveillance SA.

CCIG

The Geneva Chamber of Commerce, Industry and Services – known as the CCIG –, a private and independent organization, works towards a strong economy, conducive to local businesses sustaining their activities long-term.

VA GOV

VA carries out four specific missions to make good on that commitment. Veterans Health Care, Veterans Benefits, National Cemeteries, The Fourth Mission
